questions.ask: How far in advance should I place my order?
questions.answer: Since all orders are baked just for you, orders must be placed at least 48 hours in advance.
Cookies start at $24 a dozen. Prices can go up depending on size, detail, etc. Specific pricing information will be provided in the follow up email after orders are placed.
Currently, cookies are not being delivered or shipped. Local pickups only.

questions.ask: When will my order be ready?
questions.answer: After your order has been processed and confirmed, your cookies will be ready within 48-72 hours.

questions.ask: How do I pay for my order?
questions.answer: All orders must be paid via PayPal before in-store pickup.

All orders can be modified or canceled within at least 24 hours. Modifications/cancellations must be done over the phone and applicable refunds will be issued in the original form of payment. Since our cookies are made just for you, modifications/cancellations are not able to be made within less than 24 hours.

questions.ask: Do you offer gluten-free, sugar-free, or vegan cookies?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, we currently do not. However, subscribe to our email newsletter for future cookie options!
